subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auction for sorta Frank's Box?

What really sucks is he drags Frank's reputation into his scheme. If you ca=
n, I would contact any bidders he has and let them know.

  ----- Original =
Message ----- 
  From: ourobouros2k2 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent=
: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 11:49 PM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auction fo=
r sorta Frank's Box?





  Been following this unprofessional idiot's item=
s for awhile now. I love how he says that Frank charges thousands of dollar=
s for an original Frank's box. 

  This dude is the worst type of con, prey=
ing on people who know only enough to be familiar with the term Frank's box=
. Then again, it always has bothered me when people take shack hacks and ch=
arge stupid prices for them on ebay under the Frank's box moniker.

  This =
guy is based out of Nevada I believe, and his group's ethics leave little t=
o be desired. Takes all kinds, I reckon...

  Andy

  --- In EVP-ITC@yahoog=
roups.com, Aquarius <laustin@...> wrote:
  >
  > Hmmm... saw this on Ebay t=
onight... you've got to read all the text to hear
  > how he describes what=
 he's selling. 
  > 
  > Do any of you on this list know who he is? I just =
thought this was kind of
  > interesting... see:
  > 
  > http://tinyurl.co=
m/o5pper
  > 
  > Cheers,
  > 
  > Leslie, consistent lurker and occasional=
 poster <g>
  > 
  > "I'm not happy, I'm cheerful. There's a difference. A =
happy woman has no
  > cares at all. A cheerful woman has cares but has lea=
rned how to deal with them."
  > 
  > -- Beverly Sills (1929-) American Ope=
ra Singer
  >
